name: User Switcher
author: Irene A. Mitchell

sections.description:
A simple tool that allows you to switch between user accounts without the hassle of logging in/out. It allows you to view, review and do what yours does to your site.

Features

  • Switch between user account and to guest user.

  • Inherit all capabilities of the selected account, as if you are that very same user.

  • Helpful for developers, designers, and site owners.
sections.installation:
1. Upload userSwitcher to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Click User Switcher menu at the top (admin bar). If admin bar is disabled, you will see a small box at the bottom left corner of your page.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release.

1.1

  • Fix switcher UI at admin bar.

  • Added switcher UI if admin bar is disabled.

1.1.2

  • Rename directory url not showing on Linux.

  • Added “My Account” option for easy switching back to current account.

2.0.0

  • New improve user interface.

  • Added advanced user search.

  • Added option to switch back to restricted admin pages.

short_description: A helper tool to help you switch between user account without logging in and out.
